casebody.data:
In the Matter of Olin D. GRAY, Alleged Bankrupt. Irving Bank Columbia Trust Company, Petitioner. (Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. June 17, 1926.) No. 384. Breed, Abbott & Morgan, of New York City (H. E. Williamson, Sumner Ford, and E. A. Craighill, Jr., all of New York City, of counsel), for petitioner. Pellet, Fay & Rubin, of New York City (William W. Pellet, of New York City, of counsel), for,bankrupt.

Before HOUGH, MANTON, and HAND, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Order affirmed, with costs.
